Hi,

I'm using Win98SE (which might be connected with my problem)

my class=
path settings;

SET JUNIT_HOME=3Dc;\junit3.8.1
SET CLASSPATH=3D%CLASSPATH%;=
%JUNIT_HOME%/junit.jar

with this setting WhichJUnit finds all required fil=
es, but I cannot 
run AllTests.

But when adding SET CLASSPATH=3D%CLASSPATH=
%;%JUNIT_HOME%

WhichJUnit finnds everything and I can run AllTests in each=
 output 
mode. 

However when attempting to compile a file (such as AllTest=
s.java)javac
cannot find junit.jar (reports 'package junit.framework does n=
ot exist').

Have tried various alternative classpath settings but without =
success.

Any hints as to where I'm going wrong?
